hours_text:
# Hours & Tickets

## MUSEUM HOURS:

Tuesday through Saturday  
9:00 AM to 5:00 PM

Closed: Sunday and Monday 

## **Museum Special Event Closures:**

Closed Saturday, 31 January 2026 (All That Jazz)  
from 1:00 PM to 5 PM  
Closed Saturday, 29 August 2026

## ADMISSION:

**Members:**  
Free [(How do I become a Member?)](http://tubmanmuseum.com/membership/become-a-member/)

**Non-Members:**

Adults:| $10.00   
---|---  
Adult Group Rate (18+):| $8.00   
Children/Teens (age 3-17):| $6.00   
School or youth groups:| 1 complimentary adult admission for every 15 children or students  
AAA members:| $9.00*  
AARP members:| $9.00*  
Seniors (55+):| $9.00*  
College Students:| $9.00*  
Educators:| $9.00*  
Military:| $9.00*  
| *with valid ID  
  
## Museum Location

310 Cherry Street  
Macon, GA 31201  
Phone:[ **478-743-8544**](tel:478-743-8544)  
Fax: 478-743-9063

* * *

## Veterans Day Special

To honor our nation’s Veterans, the Tubman Museum offers a very special discount admission rate of $5.00 on Veterans Day (military ID is required).

## Required Deposits for Group Tours

The Tubman Museum requires a non-refundable* deposit for group reservations:

$25 – | 15 to 25 people  
---|---  
$50 – | 26 to 49 people  
$100 – | 50+ people  
  
* Refunds of deposits are provided only if the museum is notified 48 hours in advance of the confirmed date and time of the scheduled visit

## MUSEUM HOURS:

Tuesday through Saturday  
9:00 AM to 5:00 PM

collections_text:
# CELEBRATING AFRICAN AMERICAN ART, HISTORY AND CULTURE FOR OVER 40 YEARS

The Tubman African American Museum is the largest of its kind in the southeast dedicated to educating people about the Art, History and Culture of African Americans. 

# Exhibits & Events

[ ](https://tubmanmuseum.com/event/embracing-possibility/ "Embracing Possibility")

## [Embracing Possibility](https://tubmanmuseum.com/event/embracing-possibility/ "Embracing Possibility")

## [The Story Of IGBO Landing](https://tubmanmuseum.com/event/story-of-igbo-landing/ "The Story Of IGBO Landing")

# 2025 PAN AFRICAN FESTIVAL VENDOR INVITATION

#### Join us for the **2025 Pan African Festival of Georgia** , a vibrant celebration of culture, heritage, and community! We invite vendors to be a part of this exciting event, where thousands gather to experience the rich traditions of the African diaspora through food, ar...
